sentences.en: A bracket may be used to hold up a shelf or a candle.
sentences.cn: 托架可用来支撑搁板或蜡烛.

sentences.en: Adjust, level, light check , fire three, and bracket shots for insurance.
sentences.cn: 调整, 对好, 核对光线, 拍三张照, 再照几张备用作为保险.

sentences.en: Connection of the cables to the deck is accomplished in a bracket.
sentences.cn: 钢索与桥面连接在托架上.

sentences.en: Do you fall outside that age bracket?
sentences.cn: 你不属于那个年龄段吗？

sentences.en: Don't bracket me with him just because we work for the same company.
sentences.cn: 别因为我和他在一家公司工作而把我们相提并论.

sentences.en: Each bracket is fixed to the wall with just three screws.
sentences.cn: 每个托架只用了3颗螺钉固定在墙上。

sentences.en: Figure in bracket refers to percentage change over preceding year.
sentences.cn: 括号内的数字指与去年比较的变动百分率.

sentences.en: Fix the beam with the brackets and screws.
sentences.cn: 用支架和螺丝固定横梁。

sentences.en: He picked the telephone off the wall bracket.
sentences.cn: 他从墙上的固定托架上摘下电话。

sentences.en: I think you should bracket this word.
sentences.cn: 我认为你应该给这个字加上括号.

sentences.en: Millions of families have climbed a bracket or two.
sentences.cn: 数百万家庭的收入已提高了一两层.

sentences.en: Only people in the age - bracket 20 - 30 need apply.
sentences.cn: 只有年龄在 20-30 岁之间的人才可以申请.

sentences.en: Only people in the age bracket 20 30 need apply.
sentences.cn: 只有年龄在2030岁之间的人才可以申请.

sentences.en: So for example, tags like  or  must have a closing bracket as shown in Listing 8, taken from the above JSP.
sentences.cn: 所以，例如，从上面的 JSP 接受的如  或  这样的标记必须有一个闭括号，如清单 8 所示。

sentences.en: So for example, tags like or must have a closing bracket as shown in Listing 8, taken from the above JSP.
sentences.cn: 所以，例如，从上面的JSP接受的如或这样的标记必须有一个闭括号，如清单8 所示。

sentences.en: The bracket came loose.
sentences.cn: 托架松了.

sentences.en: the highest tax bracket
sentences.cn: 最高税级

sentences.en: The Magi, Brahmins, and Druids were bracketed together as men of wisdom.
sentences.cn: 三贤人、婆罗门、德鲁伊特教僧侣一起被归为智者。

sentences.en: This book is written for the 10 - to - 11 age bracket.
sentences.cn: 这本书是为十到十一岁年龄层的孩子写的.

sentences.en: We should distinguish the square bracket from two straight bars enclosing a determinant.
sentences.cn: 我们应将方括号与用以围住行列式的两条直线区别开.

sentences.en: Well, the bracket notation means you can index into this variable.
sentences.cn: 好的，这个括号的意思是你可以,索引这个变量。

sentences.en: When we detect an open bracket, we have found the start of a tag and return the collected characters after we have reversed their sequence.
sentences.cn: 当检测到一个开括号时，我们就找到了一个标签的开头，并将收集到的字符在逆转顺序之后返回。

phrases.tran_cn: 钢支架，钢角码；钢制肘板

trans.tran_en: one of the pair of signs ( ) put around words to show extra information

trans.tran_cn: 用括弧括上，把…相提并论
trans.tran_en: If two or more people or things are bracketed together, they are considered to be similar or related in some way
to consider two or more people or things as being similar or the same
